Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory14.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Cough. Back to the matter at hand. Now that the time and place have been decided, we need to come up with a detailed plan.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "If we're going to plan for Christmas, we need to know what to prepare. We should be able to find information on past holidays in our database.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "I always used our database to research about engineering tech. I didn't know you'd be interested in that kind of a thing, Lee.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Anything to help Liv in battle...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'If you say so—', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "But seeing as I've never celebrated Christmas... I just want to surprise Liv.", 4: '2'}
{2: "I'm sure she'll get that your heart is in the right place.", 3: '16'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Let's get going before Liv sees us like this. We need to gather information and make a list, then come up with a plan.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory17.jpg'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'This is a lot harder than I expected...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'You\'re right... I wasn\'t expecting different places to have their own ways of celebrating "Christmas".', 5: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Sorry, but I don't think we can do all of this at this point.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'I understand... but...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "We can't give up. I want to see Liv smile.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Of course. That's why we're all doing this together.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Maybe we can try looking at this from another angle.', 3: '36'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: '...What do you mean?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Maybe we can find some common elements to celebrate Christmas.', 3: '39'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Not a bad idea. Each place has their own traditions, but they still share some commonalities.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'For example, Christmas trees are often made from spruce or fir trees, which are then decorated with socks filled with candy and gifts wrapped in colorful ribbons.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Inside is also decorated with Christmas decorations, bells, mistletoes, colorful lights and ribbons, then topped off with a delicious turkey dinner.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'If it snows, it will be perfect. We can make snowmen and have snowball fights with each other, so it really feels like Christmas is in the air.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'At midnight, the clock tower in the city will ring to bless everyone on Christmas Eve. Then we can watch the biggest fireworks show of the year...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'This is a list of the common traditions for celebrating Christmas.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'But we still have a problem...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'We need a Christmas tree, decorations, snow, a Christmas Eve bell, and fireworks... But most importantly, we need manpower.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'What if we work overtime?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Lucia... Aside from the time we need to complete our mission... There isn't must time left...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Looks like we'll need to call in backup.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "If the commandant doesn't have any objections, I second the motion.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Of course, I support it. But who...?', 3: '54'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'That voice gives me a headache...', 4: '1'}
{2: '???', 3: 'Hehehe! Whenever you guys need a helping hand—!'}
{2: '???', 3: 'Whenever you guys are out of time!'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Always right on cue...', 4: '1'}
{2: '???', 3: 'Whenever you guys are in trouble!'}
{2: 'I knew this was going to happen...', 3: '65'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: '—The cute and lovable Nanami is here! TA-DA—! Hi, everyone!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "...Let's continue where we left off.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Okay... But the other teams are all out on missions. Not many people are free right now.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'We could also request some support bots from HQ.', 3: '73'}
{3: '(Skitter... Skitter...)'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Hey—! How dare you ignore Nanami! I can help you guys! Pick me!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "I'm like a caring angel here to give you hope in your time of need!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Let me help! I'm sure I'll be a BIG help!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Fine. What can you do?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'I can help wrap gifts!', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "We don't need help with that.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Then... I can sing Christmas carols!', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'Do you even know what Christmas is?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Lee, you're a meanie! Watch it, or I'll saw you to pieces! There isn't a single thing I don't know!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "This isn't all just fun and games...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Saw? You mean... your chainsaw?', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: 'W-why... Why are you giving me that look...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Perhaps, there is something you can help us with.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Really? What is it? WHAT IS IT?! Even if it's just takin' out the trash or goin' toe-to-toe against Super Corrupted—it'll be a breeze!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "It's nothing dangerous like that... Just...", 4: '2'}
